camera.name: Samsung TL225 (ST550)
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 27 mm - 124.2 mm (4.5x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung TL220 (ST500)
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 27 mm - 124.2 mm (4.5x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung SL720 (PL70)
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 28 mm - 102 mm (3.6x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung TL320 (WB1000)
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 24 mm - 120 mm (5x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: High end compact sports useful 24-120mm extra wide 5x zoom lens, unique 3.0" Organic LED screen and cute analgue style needle gauges for battery life and storage capacity. With lots of manual control and classy slimline styling the TL320 (WB100) certainly ticks a lot of enthusiast photographers' boxes but the lack of a raw mode - especially in light of Samsung's unimpressive JPEG image processing - is disappointing. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung HZ15W (WB550)
camera.description: 12.1 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 24 mm - 240 mm (10x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Second 'compact super zoom' camera from Samsung is a slightly higher-spec version of the HZ10W (WB500). Like its sister model it offers an incredibly versatile 24-240mm zoom lens, whilst upping the screen size to 3.0 inches and the sensor resolution to 12.2 megapixels. Packed with features (including 720p HD video) and sporting an attractive design and excellent user interface the TL-HZ15W looks like a strong condender in this increasingly crowded sector of the market, though (as we saw when we reviewed the H510W) there are still question marks over Samsung's image quality for more demanding users. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung CL5 (PL10)
camera.description: 9.0 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 114 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Samsung has been pushing the idea of an all-in-one 'Personal Media Player' (PMP) / camera for several years now. The CL5's funky design and range of bold color options can't hide the fact that it's a budget 9MP camera with basic MP3 and MPEG movie playback functionality. Great for teens; the rest of us would be better paying for a proper camera and leaving the media playing to a dedicated device. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung SL30 (ES15)
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 114 mm (3x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung SL202
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 28 mm - 102 mm (3.6x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung SL820 (IT100)
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 28 mm - 140 mm (5x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung SL620
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 28 mm - 102 mm (3.6x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung TL100 (ST50)
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; MP/cm^2 pixel density; 35 mm - 105 mm (3x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung ST10
camera.description: 9.1 million effective pixels; 37 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 114 mm (3x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung SL102 (ES55)
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 35 mm - 105 mm (3x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung HZ10W (WB500)
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 24 mm - 240 mm (10x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Well specified compact with a versatile 24-240mm (equiv.) 10x zoom range, HD movie capture and a wealth of features. The HZ10W(WB500 in Europe) is Samsung's first stab at the compact superzoom segment, and while the Korean manufacturer got many things right there is also some room for improvement. It's speedy, has an excellent user interface and reliable exposure, but is let down a little by image quality and low light performance issues.

camera.name: Samsung CL65 (ST1000)
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 35 mm - 175 mm (5x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung HZ25W (WB5000)
camera.description: 12.5 million effective pixels; 44 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 26 mm - 624 mm (24x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung SL310 (L310W)
camera.description: 13.6 million effective pixels; 33 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 28 mm - 102 mm (3.6x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung TL34HD (NV100HD)
camera.description: 14.7 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 28 mm - 102 mm (3.6x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: The TL34 HD (or NV100 HD as it is known in Europe) is the new flagship of Samsung's NV range, offering high resolution (14.7 MP), a wide zoom lens and a wealth of features. With its sleek design and touch-screen user interface it appears to be aimed at the gadget loving technophile, but looking at its spec sheet it's clearly got a lot to offer to more serious photographers as well. Unfortunately the image quality is poor (it may have almost 15 megapixels, but the output would be unimpressive for an 8MP camera) and it's frustratingly slow in use.

camera.name: Samsung TL9 (NV9)
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 190 mm (5x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung S1070
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 105 mm (2.7x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung L201 (SL201)
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 35 mm - 105 mm (3x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung GX-20
camera.description: 14.6 million effective pixels; 4.0 MP/cm^2 pixel density;

camera.name: Samsung ST45
camera.description: 12.2 million effective pixels; 43 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 35 mm - 105 mm (3x) zoom lens;

camera.name: Samsung NV4
camera.description: 8.2 million effective pixels; 33 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 114 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Yet another Samsung compact camera with PMP (portable media player) functionality that allows it to double as an MP3 and movie player. Nice design, lots of gadgetry, pretty basic camera capabilities. Samsung i8 offers similar feature set in slightly less premium packaging. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung NV24HD
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 24 mm - 86.5 mm (3.5x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: The first Samsung compact to offer 720p HD movie recording is also one of the few models on the market with a 24mm (equivalent) wide lens (at the short end of its 24-86.5mm zoom). The comprehensive feature set, unique user interface and stylish design are all very appealing, but question marks over image quality continue to dog Samsung's assault on the premium and enthusiast compact camera market. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung NV30
camera.description: 8.1 million effective pixels; 33 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 37 mm - 111 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Cut-down version of the NV24HD drops the wide zoom, image stabilization and offers a lower pixel count but retains the cool styling and extensive feature set. Also check out the NV40, which is almost identical but offers 10 megapixels and lens stabilization. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung NV40
camera.description: 10.5 million effective pixels; 37 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 37 mm - 111 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Samsung continues to pad out the NV range with slight specification variations. The NV40 offers a higher resolution (10MP) than identical twin the NV30, and - more usefully - throws optical image stabilization into the mix. Otherwise a basic camera with a lot of features but unimpressive photographic specification. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung i8
camera.description: 8.2 million effective pixels; 33 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 114 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Samsung has been pushing the idea of an all-in-one 'Personal Media Player' (PMP) / camera for several years now. The i80's smart design and large touch-screen LCD can't hide the fact that it's a budget camera with basic MP3 and MPEG movie playback functionality. If the thought of watching movies or listening to music on your camera appeals then the older i85 offers a slightly more impressive camera at a similar price. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung L210
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 37 mm - 111 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: The Samsung L210 is one of the few truly compact models in this price bracket, and it packs an impressive list of features including optical image stabilization and a relatively high screen resolution. The polished user interface and quality finish belie the L210's entry-level pricing, and in broad daylight the results aren't bad at all. In low light the performance is far less impressive, with poor high ISO results, less than perfect flash exposures and focus failures. Add to this the long shutter lag (the delay between pressing the button and the picture being taken) and slow startup, and it's obvious that the L210 isn't quite as good as first impressions would suggest.

camera.name: Samsung L110
camera.description: 8.2 million effective pixels; 33 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 37 mm - 111 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: One of three almost identical entry-level budget cameras from the prolific Korean giant. Smaller and more stylish than most cameras at this level, the L110 is packed with gadgetry (though inevitably the photographic specification is pretty basic). We tested the L110's 10MP brother (the L210) and found much to like, though the low-light and flash performance was disappointing. The L110 and L100 appear to be functionally identical.

camera.name: Samsung L100
camera.description: 8.2 million effective pixels; 33 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 37 mm - 111 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: One of three almost identical entry-level budget cameras from the prolific Korean giant. Smaller and more stylish than most cameras at this level, the L100 is packed with gadgetry (though inevitably the photographic specification is pretty basic). We tested the L100's 10MP brother (the L210) and found much to like, though the low-light and flash performance was disappointing.

camera.name: Samsung i100
camera.description: 10.2 million effective pixels; 36 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 114 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Samsung has been pushing the idea of an all-in-one 'Personal Media Player' (PMP) / camera for several years now, and the i100 is the latest in a line of stylish cameras to offer music (MP3) and movie (MPEG) playback as well as stills and movie capture. The 200MB or so of internal memory is weedy compared to dedicated players and the camera - though packed with gadgetry - is very basic, and the media playback doesn't hide the fact this is a budget camera with a premium price tag. (April 2009).

camera.name: Samsung i80
camera.description: 8.2 million effective pixels; 33 MP/cm^2 pixel density; 38 mm - 114 mm (3x) zoom lens;
camera.summary: Yet another Samsung all-in-one 'Personal Media Player' (PMP) / camera, the i80 offers a basic camera specification combined with a fairly basic MP3 and movie player wrapped up in a stylish sliding design that's packed with digital gadgets but has little to inspire the serious photographer. (April 2009).
